name: Fight the Dracula! Again!
description:
Early version of "Fight the Dracula! Again!" the sequel to my first game "Fight the Dracula!" 

In this new game I implement the things I learned from creating "Fight the Dracula!" to make a smoother and better experience overall.

In this game, just like in the first game, all you do is fight Dracula. Shoot him in the face until he is dead.  (There is currently no death animation for Dracula or an ending, he just kinda stops existing.)

Controls Controller

Face buttons to jump an shoot

dpad/ left stick to move

shoulder buttons to dash 

Controls Keyboard

Arrow keys to move

x to jump

c to shoot

v to dash
